Package fr.maxlego08.itemstacker.zcore.utils

Class MessageUtils

java.lang.Object
fr.maxlego08.itemstacker.zcore.utils.PapiUtils
fr.maxlego08.itemstacker.zcore.utils.LocationUtils
fr.maxlego08.itemstacker.zcore.utils.MessageUtils
Direct Known Subclasses:
ZUtils
public abstract class MessageUtils extends LocationUtils
Allows you to manage messages sent to players and the console. Provides various utility methods for sending and formatting messages. Extends LocationUtils.
See Also:

    • message

      protected void message(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender, Message message, Object... args)
      Allows you to send a message to a command sender.
      Parameters:
      sender - the user who sent the command.
      message - the message - using the Message enum for simplified message management.
      args - the arguments - the arguments work in pairs, you must put for example %test% and then the value.
